SELECT ari.id, ari.role_bid, ari.`identity`, ari.`type`, ari.created_time, ari.created_by, ari.tenant_id, ari.enable_flag, ari.delete_flag, ari.NAME, ari.dept_name, ari.input_percentage, ar.CODE AS roleCode, ar.NAME AS roleName FROM apm_role ar, apm_role_identity ari, apm_sphere asp WHERE ar.bid = ari.role_bid AND ar.delete_flag = 0 AND ari.delete_flag = 0 AND asp.delete_flag = 0 AND asp.bid = ar.sphere_bid AND ari.type = 'employee' AND asp.type = #{sphereType} AND asp.biz_bid = #{bizBid} and ar.code in
#{code}

select ari.id,ar.bid as roleBid,ari.`identity`, ari.`type`,ari.created_time,ari.created_by, ari.tenant_id,ari.enable_flag,ari.delete_flag, ari.name, ari.dept_name,ari.input_percentage, ar.code as roleCode, ar.name as roleName, ar.description, ar.type as roleType, ar.parent_bid as parentBid from apm_role ar left join apm_role_identity ari on ar.bid = ari.role_bid and ari.delete_flag = 0 where ar.delete_flag = 0 and ar.sphere_bid = #{sphereBid}

select ari.id,ari.role_bid,ari.`identity`, ari.`type`,ari.created_time,ari.created_by, ari.tenant_id,ari.enable_flag,ari.delete_flag, ari.name, ari.dept_name,ari.input_percentage, ar.code as roleCode, ar.name as roleName,ar.sphere_bid as sphereBid from apm_role ar inner join apm_role_identity ari on ar.bid = ari.role_bid and ar.delete_flag = 0 and ari.delete_flag = 0 where ari.type = 'employee'
and ar.sphere_bid in
#{sphereBid}
and ari.input_percentage is not null order by ari.created_time
